AssociateResource.name: AssociateResource
AssociateResource.description: Grants permission to associate a resource to an Application

CreateGroup.name: CreateGroup
CreateGroup.description: Grants permission to create a resource group with a specified name, description, and resource query

DeleteGroup.name: DeleteGroup
DeleteGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a specified resource group

DeleteGroupPolicy.name: DeleteGroupPolicy
DeleteGroupPolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a resource-based policy for the specified group

DisassociateResource.name: DisassociateResource
DisassociateResource.description: Grants permission to disassociate a resource from an Application

GetAccountSettings.name: GetAccountSettings
GetAccountSettings.description: Grants permission to get the current status of optional features in Resource Groups

GetGroup.name: GetGroup
GetGroup.description: Grants permission to get information of a specified resource group

GetGroupConfiguration.name: GetGroupConfiguration
GetGroupConfiguration.description: Grants permission to get the service configuration associated with the specified resource group

GetGroupPolicy.name: GetGroupPolicy
GetGroupPolicy.description: Grants permission to get a resource-based policy for the specified group

GetGroupQuery.name: GetGroupQuery
GetGroupQuery.description: Grants permission to get the query associated with a specified resource group

GetTags.name: GetTags
GetTags.description: Grants permission to get the tags associated with a specified resource group

GroupResources.name: GroupResources
GroupResources.description: Grants permission to add the specified resources to the specified group

ListGroupResources.name: ListGroupResources
ListGroupResources.description: Grants permission to list the resources that are members of a specified resource group

ListGroups.name: ListGroups
ListGroups.description: Grants permission to list all resource groups in your account

ListResourceTypes.name: ListResourceTypes
ListResourceTypes.description: Grants permission to list supported resource types

PutGroupConfiguration.name: PutGroupConfiguration
PutGroupConfiguration.description: Grants permission to put the service configuration associated with the specified resource group

PutGroupPolicy.name: PutGroupPolicy
PutGroupPolicy.description: Grants permission to add a resource-based policy for the specified group

SearchResources.name: SearchResources
SearchResources.description: Grants permission to search for AWS resources matching the given query

Tag.name: Tag
Tag.description: Grants permission to tag a specified resource group

UngroupResources.name: UngroupResources
UngroupResources.description: Grants permission to remove the specified resources from the specified group

Untag.name: Untag
Untag.description: Grants permission to remove tags associated with a specified resource group

UpdateAccountSettings.name: UpdateAccountSettings
UpdateAccountSettings.description: Grants permission to update optional features in Resource Groups

UpdateGroup.name: UpdateGroup
UpdateGroup.description: Grants permission to update a specified resource group

UpdateGroupQuery.name: UpdateGroupQuery
UpdateGroupQuery.description: Grants permission to update the query associated with a specified resource group
